name: Super Marty-o
description:
Running through this once peaceful kingdom and destroying it has its consequences. The more you destroy, the higher your combo and score goes...however, more angry inhabitants will want their revenge.

Use the arrow keys to run and jump.

"Pixelland"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
